subject: Web3
title: Ethereum Virtual Machine
description: Learn Ethereum Virtual Machine in one minute.

hook.text: The Ethereum Virtual Machine is like a giant shared computer. Thousands of nodes run it simultaneously.

buildup.text: The EVM executes smart contract code identically on every node. If results don't match, something is wrong.

discovery.text: This means no single computer can cheat. Every calculation is verified by the entire network.

twist.text: Running code on thousands of machines is wildly inefficient. That's why Ethereum gas fees are so high.

climax.text: The EVM's design has been copied by dozens of other blockchains. It became the standard for smart contract platforms.

punchline.text: The world's slowest computer is also the most trustworthy.

quiz.question: Why is the Ethereum Virtual Machine considered trustworthy?
options: Every node runs the same code and verifies the same results
